titleStmt.title: A very fruitful & godly exposition vpo[n] the. xv. Psalme of Dauid called Lord, who shall dwell in thy tabernacle. Made by M. Ihon Epinus, preacher to the churche of Hamborough: and translated oute of Latin into English by N.L.
titleStmt.author: Aepinus, Johann, 1499-1553.
Lesse, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Daye, dwellyng in Sepulchres parish, at the signe of the Resurrection, a litle aboue Holborne co[n]dite,

notesStmt.note: Publication place and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 10429 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Sepulchres parish, at the signe of the Resurrection, a litle aboue Holborne co[n]dite
